Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Extends the September 11th worker protection task force act
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of the September 11th worker protection task force act.
LawCode: Amd Part B ยง11, Chap 104 of 2005
ActClause: AN ACT amending part B of chapter 104 of the laws of 2005 enacting the September 11th worker protection task force act, in relation to extending the effectiveness of the provisions of such act
